few_shot_examples.prompt: How many roads are there in the map?
How many roads contain multiple lanes?
few_shot_examples.query: MATCH (r:Road)-[:HAS_LANE]->(l:Lane) WITH r, COUNT(l) AS lane_count WHERE lane_count > 1 RETURN COUNT(r) AS roads_with_multiple_lanes;

few_shot_examples.prompt: Return the names of the signs
few_shot_examples.query: MATCH (o:Object) RETURN DISTINCT o.name AS sign_name
MATCH (r:Road)-[:HAS_LANE]->(l1:Lane) WHERE (l1)-[:PRECEDES {direction:'left'}]->() RETURN DISTINCT r.id as roadId

few_shot_examples.prompt: How many driving lanes are there?
How many roads have driving lanes in each direction?
few_shot_examples.query: MATCH (r:Road)-[:HAS_LANE]->(l1:Lane {type:'driving', travelDirection:'forward'}) MATCH (r)-[:HAS_LANE]->(l2:Lane {type:'driving', travelDirection:'backward'}) RETURN COUNT(r) as roads_both_driving_direction

few_shot_examples.prompt: How many three-way driving intersections are there?
